mapper.insert: insert into topic (topic_id, create_time, user_id, title, status, note_id, pid, author_name) values (#{topicId}, #{createTime}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{status}, #{noteId}, #{pid}, #{authorName})
mapper.select: select * from topic t left join content_detail cd on index_id = topic_id where topic_id = #{topicId}
